Text: If this is an iTunes release where in the hell is the original artwork and why are there CDDB tags, incomplete year tag, and purchaser along with purchase date tags missing? Oh yeah that's right BECAUSE ITS NOT THE FUCKING ITUNES VERSION!
@CyPhErLoUs No one stated that this was the official iTunes version. This is, however, a flawless iTunes-ready release with correct tags, album artwork and flawless, true 256kbps quality.
